name: Fisher & Paykel Healthcare Corporation Limited
description: Fisher & Paykel Healthcare Corporation Limited is a global leader in the design, manufacture, and marketing of innovative medical devices and products. Founded in 1934, the company has dedicated itself to improving the lives of patients and healthcare professionals through its advanced respiratory and acute care solutions. With a focus on developing products that enhance patient comfort and care, Fisher & Paykel Healthcare is well-known for its range of humidification systems, CPAP devices for sleep apnea, and products for neonatal and adult intensive care. The company's commitment to research and development ensures that it remains at the forefront of technology in the healthcare sector, continually delivering solutions that meet evolving clinical needs. Fisher & Paykel Healthcare operates in over 120 countries, serving a diverse range of healthcare professionals and institutions. The company maintains a strong emphasis on sustainability and corporate responsibility, ensuring that its operations minimize environmental impact while maximizing the quality of life for patients around the world. With a strong presence in both the hospital and homecare markets, Fisher & Paykel Healthcare is positioned as a trusted partner in the global healthcare community, dedicated to advancing medical technology and enhancing patient outcomes.

seo.meta_title: Fisher & Paykel Healthcare | Innovative Medical Devices
seo.meta_description: Explore Fisher & Paykel Healthcare, a global leader in innovative medical devices for respiratory care and sleep apnea. Discover our commitment to improving patient outcomes.

faq.question: What does Fisher & Paykel Healthcare specialize in?
faq.answer: Fisher & Paykel Healthcare specializes in innovative medical devices and products for respiratory care and sleep apnea.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Fisher & Paykel Healthcare?
faq.answer: Lewis Gradon is the CEO of Fisher & Paykel Healthcare Corporation Limited.

faq.question: Where is Fisher & Paykel Healthcare headquartered?
faq.answer: Fisher & Paykel Healthcare is headquartered in Auckland, New Zealand.

faq.question: What are the main product categories of Fisher & Paykel Healthcare?
faq.answer: The main product categories include Respiratory Care and Sleep Apnea devices.

faq.question: When was Fisher & Paykel Healthcare founded?
faq.answer: Fisher & Paykel Healthcare was founded in 1934.
